fulltext:
NGUYEN MINH KHOI 
SENIOR FRONT-END DEVELOPER 
DATE OF BIRTH: 
MAY 15, 1984 
EMAIL:  minhkhoi2020@gmail.com 
PHONE:  0982709515 
ADDRESS: 
Hoc Mon District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
INTRODUCTION 
I’m a front-end developer with 10 years of experience. I have strong 
experience in AngularJS, JavaScript, HTML5, SCSS, CSS, Web Responsive. I also 
have many years working as full stack and back-end developer with .NET 
technology, ASP.NET, C#, Windows form applications, SQL Server, Windows 
Server, database design and system design. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
Restaff - House Of Norway 
Antenor OTG Norway 
Dec 2018 - Now 
Position: Senior Front-End Developer 
Description:  
I work for Antenor OTG company which is located in Norway, joining in project 
named "Antenor Business Management System (ABMS)". 
ABMS is the complete cloud-based system for quality, risk and business 
management. With this you can replace a myriad of manual solutions, one solution 
for everything. Thus, you have immediately saved costs in relation to license costs 
and internal administrative time. 
Please go to company website at http://antenor.no for more information about 
company and ABMS. 
Technologies used in project: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, coffee script, 
SCSS, CSS, HTML,  Cypress for client automation test. 
My Responsibilities: 
ü Join weekly meeting with manager and technical leader from Norway and 
Romania to discuss about requirements, sprint planning, and sprint review. 
ü Get requirements of client, break tasks and create neccessary tickets on 
gitlab.com then implement them one by one. 
ü Propose my idea about new features or things need to be improved 
ü Design UI/UX for the new requirements/features 
ü Coding all features of front end side. 
ü Find and fix bugs on the project 
My Skills used: AngularJS, Angular UI bootstrap, bootstrap,  SCSS, D3js, design web 
responsive, Adobe XD Adobe Photoshop for UI/UX design. 
Position: Senior Front-End Developer 
Description:  
OPSWAT is a cyber-security software company, headquartered in San Francisco, 
US. Joining in OPSWAT, I undertake front-end development in one of the most 
important project of Opswat named MetaAccess, this is a security cloud based 
solution. MetaAccess is a security solution for your local network, it prevents risky 
devices from accessing your local network. Refer 
https://www.opswat.com/products/metaaccess for more details. 
Technologies used in project: Java, MongoDB, NodeJS, Linux server,  IDE for coding 
is Spring Tool Suite. 
My Responsibilities:  
ü Build MetaAccess project from the beginning. 
ü I’m responsible for all tasks about front end. 
ü Get mockup file from designer, slice to HTML. 
ü Write all client scripts, to handle user interaction with server. 
ü Design UI/UX in some situations. 
My Skills used: AngularJS, NodeJS,  Javascript, jQuery,  HTML5, SCSS, CSS3, D3JS for 
drawing charts, Adobe XD for UI/UX design, Adobe Photoshop for images 
processing and another tasks relevant to UI. 
Position: Full stack .NET Developer 
Description:  
South Telecom is a company providing telecommunication software and services. 
Joining South Telecom I undertake database design, developing main web portal of 
company, many internal websites for managing customers, services, managing 
calling logs of VoIP Services. 
My Responsibilities:  
ü Develop all web applications of company: main website, web application for 
managing agency, web application for customer support, web application 
for selling international phone card. 
ü Get mockup from UI designer, slice to HTML, implement JavaScript to 
process user’s actions. 
ü Design system and database with SQL server, programming store 
procedures, functions. 
ü Implement web services to connect with partner, connecting with payment 
gate. 
ü Design UI in some situations. 
ü Manage and monitor servers 
OPSWAT Software 
Dec 2012 – Nov 2018 
South Telecom 
Jun 2009 – Dec 2012 
EDUCATION 
Mekong Delta Aptech – Can Tho City 
From 2006 – 2009 
High Diploma In Software Engineering 
OVERALL SKILLS 
70%
78%
50%
85%
80%
70%
50%

GIT
SQL Server
Java

Photoshop
Adobe XD
UI/UX

NodeJS
HTML
SCSS, CSS3
Javascript
Angular
Technologies used: ASP.NET, C#, SQL Server, Windows server, IIS, Cisco, VoIP 
gateway, IDE Visual Studio. 
My skills used: C#, ASP.NET, SQL Programming, SQL Database Design, Javascript, 
jQuery, jQueryUI, HTML, CSS, Adobe Photoshop, management windows servers.
